movie.title: Joe and Max
movie.plot: True story of boxers Joe Louis and Max Schmeling and their enduring friendship.

movie.title: The Third Half
movie.plot: Determined to build the best football club in the country, Dimitry hires the German coach, Rudolph Spitz, to galvanize his rag tag team but - when the first Nazi tanks roll through the city and Rebecca, the beautiful daughter of a local banker, elopes with his star player, all Dimitry's plans must change.
